title: How to use Publisher Rocket - A tutorial for authors
description:
In this video, I'll be explaining how to use Publisher Rocket as a self-published author or marketer. I'll be explaining all the different features available and how to use them in this video.

Also my debut novel, 'Voiceless: A Mermaid's Tale', is now available for pre-order in eBook and will be available for order on the 20th of October in paperback. For those who are interested, there are still ARCs available for 'Voiceless', the links are below.

Arc Review Links:

https://booksprout.co/arc/45913/voiceless 
https://storyoriginapp.com/reviewcopies/8a5a1b9d-d97c-4784-a711-36b0ed81ed7b 
Pre-order Links:
*If you click on this Books2Read link it will take you to a page with links to nearly all platforms you can pre-order my novel from including Google Play Books, Kobo, Nook, Apple, Amazon and more.
